tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had my full body checkup once and found that there is variation in my ECG waveform. * *** ******** *** ******* *** *** ******** ********* ** ***** ** ********** *** ****** ******* **** **** ********** ** ***** ** ****** ** ** ***** *** ** ** ****** ****** My friend referred me to Dr.Sumanta. I came here with the old test reports and explained my problem. The doctor listened to me very patiently and examined my heart using ECG and Echo. He asked me to visit after a couple of months. He again took the same tests and told me that I am perfectly fine and needs no treatment or medication. **** ***** *** ********* **** *********** *** Dr. Sumanta chatterjee sir gave good advise and improved my confidence. Now I even run marathon and ride cycle a lot. I am perfectly fine. Thank you Doctor

tags: None
review: *** ** **** ************ ****** ********** ** *** **** **** ****** *** **** ***** *******..I really glad to say despite being one of big name ..still available on phone anytime a day...for help...in this field this could be a rare quality u will find...u will b always assured to have one specialist on your finger tip when u require u most..I have experience same in difficult time like lockdown for my mother...must place to visit in required time....and ye best consultant in thier fraternity...personally experience....thank Dr Sumanta for your support.....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Extremely pleasant  experience.Amiable attitude towards patients.I wish him good luck.He took utmost care and followed some tests and gave me final suggestion.I went through treadmill test too.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor advised Dilzem CD 90 for my mother's Ongoing palpitations and told us to visit after 3 weeks. **** *** **** ***** *** ** ******* ** ******** ********* *** ************** After 10 days I revisited him but he pressed on with the same medicine for another 2 weeks. Meanwhile the puja vacation arrived and the clinic was closed. It was finally after 1 month, he agreed to change the medicine to a beta blocker. The palpitations decreases **** *** **** *** ***** *** ***** In a week my mother's pulse was getting low and she was pale. Then I decided to change the doctor.  *** *** *** ****** * ** ************* *** ****** ******* *** ******* **** **** ***** **** ***** ** *** ******* **** ** ****** ********* * **** ******* ****** ****** ** ** ************ ******* *********** ******* *** ***** ****** *** ** *** ** ******** All I want to convey to Dr S.Chaterjee is that when a patient is complaining that a medicine is not suiting him/her, the doctor should take notice of it. *** ***** **** ******** ***** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am extremely happy with Dr Sumanta Chatterjee. I took my mother to Dr Sumanta Sir for consultation and was very happy with his service. He is very humble and has a smiling face. He explained very nicely. No unnecessary medications. Thanks a lot. I strongly recommend everyone to visit Dr. Sumanta Chatterjee sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Doctor listens to the problem, interacts with patients to gather as much info as possible to diagnose. Also doesn't go for tests unnecessarily, advises patients properly and gives confidence. I would recommend the doctor for his humbleness and concern for his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful experience with Sumanta chatterjee. His warm welcoming smile relieves the health stress to half as you visit him.Has always been extremely helpful with all cardiology queries after an angioplasty on my husband Extremely warm,supportive,,friendly guide,knowledgeable, wise and trustworthy.Big Thank you from a  healing heart to the treating heart.Good luck always
